channel.title: Can I import 2 whonix (2 workstations + 2 gateways) in virtualbox?
channel.description:
Hey,
I'd like to have two Whonix in my Virtualbox for two different purposes. **How can I do it?**
1) Use 1 gateway and 2 different workstations (one gateway for both workstations) 2) Or use 2 different gateways for 2 different workstations (each gateway for the each workstation)
(I'm not going to launch both workstations or gateways at the same time, only separately)
**Сan gateways somehow conflict with each other If I have 2 of them installed in my Virtualbox (but I launch them only separately)?**

item.title: Can I import 2 whonix (2 workstations + 2 gateways) in virtualbox?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Multiple Whonix-Gateway ™

Compartmentalization. Managing multiple Whonix-Gateway ™.

Whonix – 26 Dec 20

Multiple Whonix-Workstation ™

Compartmentalization. Better separation of different tasks and/or pseudonyms by using multiple Whonix-Workstation ™.

Read full topic
item.source: Can I import 2 whonix (2 workstations + 2 gateways) in virtualbox?

item.title: Can I import 2 whonix (2 workstations + 2 gateways) in virtualbox?
item.dc:creator: barryogorman
item.description:
Hey,

I’d like to have two Whonix in my Virtualbox for two different purposes. How can I do it?

  1. Use 1 gateway and 2 different workstations (one gateway for both workstations)
  2. Or use 2 different gateways for 2 different workstations (each gateway for the each workstation)

(I’m not going to launch both workstations or gateways at the same time, only separately)

Сan gateways somehow conflict with each other If I have 2 of them installed in my Virtualbox (but I launch them only separately)?

Read full topic
